item.title: How Long Does It Take to Adjust to Eye Floaters?
item.description:
You’ve probably heard it:

“Don’t worry, you’ll get used to them.”

Okay — but when?
How long does it take to stop obsessing, stop noticing, and actually feel like yourself again?

If you’re asking, “How long does it take to adjust to eye floaters?” — this post is for you.

Let’s talk timelines, phases, and what you can do to speed things up.

So… How Long Does It Really Take?
